sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Tab, Tabs, Badge } from "react-bootstrap" import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { courseService, assessmentService } from "../services/api" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" const CourseDetailPage = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [course, setCourse] = useState(null) const [assessments, setAssessments] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const { user } = useAuth() useEffect(() => { fetchCourseDetails() }, [id]) const fetchCourseDetails = async () => { try { const [courseResponse, assessmentsResponse] = await Promise.all([ courseService.getCourseById(id), assessmentService.getAssessmentsByCourse(id), ]) setCourse(courseResponse.data) setAssessments(assessmentsResponse.data) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching course details:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleEnroll = async () => { try { await courseService.enrollInCourse(id) fetchCourseDetails() // Refresh course data } catch (error) { console.error("Error enrolling in course:", error) } } if (loading) { return (
Loading course...
) } if (!course) { return (

Course Not Found

The course you're looking for doesn't exist.

 ) } return (
{course.title}

Instructor: {course.instructorName || "TBA"}

{user && user.role === "Student" && ( )}
{course.description}
Course Materials
{course.materials && course.materials.length > 0 ? (
{course.materials.map((material, index) => (
{material.title}

{material.type}
))}
) : (

No course materials available yet.

)}
Course Assessments
{assessments.length > 0 ? (
{assessments.map((assessment) => (
{assessment.title}

{assessment.description}

{assessment.questionCount} Questions Max Score: {assessment.maxScore}
{user && user.role === "Student" && course.isEnrolled && ( )}
))}
) : (

No assessments available for this course.

)}
Course Information
Enrolled Students: {course.enrolledStudents || 0}
Assessments: {assessments.length}
Created: {new Date(course.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
Last Updated: {new Date(course.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString()}
{course.isEnrolled && (
Your Progress
{course.progress || 0}%

Course Completion

 )} ) } export default CourseDetailPage
